Reviews.Title: “Great experience as always!”
Reviews.Author: ufasc
Reviews.Content: Very thankful to Dave Gillen & the co-owners for their clear & prompt communication, clean and comfortable lodging, the pool/hot tub, grill etc and for keeping it very reasonably priced for our big family. We stay at Golden Arrow every 2-3 years when we are stateside & we've never been disappointed. Great setting next to the woods at Table Rock Lake, quite and peaceful, even saw deer in the mornings.

Reviews.Title: “Economical”
Reviews.Author: TheCoops99
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for one night over the weekend. It is clean, quiet, economical, and close to Silver Dollar City. There are lots of trees, a playground, a hot tub, and a pool. The grounds are quite charming. Each unit has a grill and picnic table. The rooms are dated, but adequate. The kitchens would save a family a lot of money during a long stay.Now for the negative. I must say the bathrooms leave a lot to be desired. Just updating the shower heads would make a huge difference. The one in our unit was terrible, and if you're tall, forget about washing your hair. We had no hot water when we woke up on Saturday morning, so a shower was out of the question. However, they did make it right by us and were very gracious about it. We arrived late on Friday night (8 pm or so), and an envelope with the key inside was taped to the door of the office, with our name and room number on it. To me, this could have been a safety issue. Also, there was no phone in our room to be able to contact the office about our water issue. Just so you know, there is no ice machine, you have to buy ice from the office, and they are only there from 9-5. (There is a phone near the office that you can use to call the staff if you need them.) The bed wasn't comfortable, but we know not to expect great beds unless you pay more for a room. I don't mean to nitpick, just want to be as detailed as possible. While we will probably not return, if you are looking for a clean and very economical place to stay on Indian Point, and you go in knowing that you get what you pay for, then this is a good place to stay to be close to SDC. Clean room, friendly staff, just not the place for us.

Reviews.Title: “Relaxing week”
Reviews.Author: fabshack
Reviews.Content: if you're looking for luxury, this is not the place for you. But if you want quiet, clean, economical and relaxing Golden Arrow fits the bill. We stayed in a cottage (chalet) it was spacious and clean with a great covered deck. It was very quiet and private. Yes a bit dated but hey its a cottage, brought back my childhood memories. Much more comfortable than a hotel room. The pool was sparkling clean and our girls enjoyed the slide. We could bring our small dog for 10.00 extra. overall a great relaxing week.

Reviews.Title: “Best feature: cleanliness”
Reviews.Author: Pat C
Reviews.Content: This family owned resort welcomes guests to cabin-type areas with 2 bedrooms, fully stocked kitchen, bathroom. On site is a swimming pool and hot tub. I am so impressed with the cleanliness of the resort. Everything is spotless. The owners are friendly, chatty, but not too talkative. All utensils are in the kitchen with pots, pans, dishes, etc. The pool and the hot tub also are very clean and a pleasure to use. There is a play area for children. Very family friendly.

Reviews.Title: “perfect room for us”
Reviews.Author: SDCvisitor
Reviews.Content: My family loves to go to Silver Dollar City. This resort is nearby, and is on the favorable side of the highway to avoid traffic congestion to and from SDC. One of our boys has many food allergies, so most of his food has to be prepared while on the road, which is a logistics hassle. The kitchen in the two bedroom room was great, which made food preparation much easier than a typical room with only a microwave and a dorm-size refridgerator. The full-size refridgerator was a definate plus. A few days after arriving home from this trip, we recieved a package from David at Golden Arrow. He found one of our boys' t-shirts and sounvenier penny by the pool and mailed them to us. That is great customer service, and is appreciated. The pool is large, very well maintained and has a slide that kids love. The hot tub is located in it's own gazebo. There are two different play areas for kids, one near the pool with swings, and merry-go-round. Another area with a swing is behind the rooms. Other than the mattresses being harder than we are used to, we enjoyed our stay at the Golden Arrow and will definately return.

Reviews.Title: “A Definite Keeper...Will Tell Friends and Family...Will Certainly Return”
Reviews.Author: dinglebat
Reviews.Content: Wanted to get away from the hassle of work and spend time with the family before the youngest heads off to college. Great location, easy to get to everything we needed, to include groceries. For the 3 of us, the "C" unit was perfect...it was clean and had enough cookware for us to do what we needed. Was it brand new...absolutely not. But for a safe, clean place to lay your head and cook your meals while enjoying the Branson attractions with your family, especially with the economy acting the way it is, there is probably no better place to stay than Golden Arrow. Yes, there was one group that arrived and decided to see just how late into the night they could be loud, but you can certainly find that anywhere. The key is that Dave runs the place much like my parents did their resort in Wisconsin years ago...with customer service and personal attention in mind. He was so quick to fix an issue with the deadbolt on our door that is would make a person's head spin. If friends or family are headed to Branson, as they often do, I will surely tell them to call Dave first.

Reviews.Title: “what a letdown”
Reviews.Author: Lanyard77
Reviews.Content: We made reservations for two day weekend,sent a check and were ready to go ,when Golden Arrow called and said our room was booked by someone else and they would send us a check.It was a holiday weekend and we couldn't find anyplace else to stay;So were left high and dry. We had stayed their many times before,but will never recomend it to anyone again.

Reviews.Title: “We really enjoyed our stay and will be coming back:)”
Reviews.Author: colft001
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed for the weekend for our anniversary we were on a tight budget and we stayed here all weekend for cheaper than a hotel room for one tight. It was just the two of us so we stayed in the studio with the kitchenette. This helped us out a lot we had most meals here in our room. Golden aroow is away from the hustle and bustle of the Branson strip. We even found rounds to get where we needed to go without going through the stop and go of the strip:) The room was very clean the People were really nice. The area is very beautiful! Next time we are bringing another couple with us so we can stay in the bigger cabins that are in the back they look really cool with their own covered deck! From now on when we come to Branson to stay we will be using Golden Arrow Resort.

Reviews.AuthorLocation: just outside of St. Louis, MO
Reviews.Title: “Nice, Quiet, Clean, Good Location”
Reviews.Author: ErinC76
Reviews.Content: I stayed here for 3 nights in June 2010 with my husband and 4 other couples. It was a tight squeeze but we really just needed a place with A/C, electricity and plumbing. It was really clean and the unit we rented had an awesome covered porch like deck. We spent most of our time out on the lake or at the pool when we were back at the cabin we were mostly on that porch. It poured rain our first night there but we were all dry and comfortable on the porch! We didn't go to SilverDollar City but it is REALLY close(like 2 miles), Branson was about a 10 minute drive and Branson West is 5 minutes (we grocery shopped there). The owners were really nice too, which always makes a trip more pleasant. This place isn't on the lake directly but the marina is 1/2 mile down the road and there is a public access area next to the marina too. We thought that would be a bummer but we really didn't miss it as much as we thought we would. All in all, I would stay here again. P.S. If you are into wildlife, ask for a unit in the back---deer, turkey and other animals are everywhere!

Reviews.Title: “nice quiet place to stay!!”
Reviews.Author: Carrie4785
Reviews.Content: I recently stayed at this restort in Branson actual on Table Rock Road. This place is very quiet and out of the way. It was 10 min. from Branson so we did not have to deal with the busy traffic at the resort. The room was clean and had to seperate bedrooms which is great for privacy and to relax. The kitchen was great to have as this saved us a lot of money as we cooked 1-2 meals per day. I would definitely return as the price was great and the staff was very helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely wonderful!!!”
Reviews.Author: ADAMSJT
Reviews.Content: Thank you Dave and Alice for a wonderful Spring break! Our stay was wonderful. The rooms were very clean and accomodating. We are seniors and don't want to spend a small fortune on a room. The rates were very economical and the location was very peaceful and quiet. We will definditely come back again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value and Nice People”
Reviews.Author: lovetovacation97
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at The Golden Arrow Resort twice and will always return. Its a very relaxed and quite place close to the lake. The owners are very nice and helpful. This is a very clean resort. When we first arrived I was kinda hesitant by the "older" look of the buildings, but that didnt matter once we relized how clean the rooms are and friendly the staff are. The kids loved the pool with the slide and the hot tub. We have returned here just to stay as a get away and didnt do any of the attractions/shows. We would recommend this resort to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Golden Arrow is the place to Go!”
Reviews.Author: 7Happy
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at the Golden Arrow twice in the past five years, both times we were comfortable and enjoyed the clean, well-maintained rooms as well as the pool and hot tub. The value for the price was a big factor in our going back this year. We have stayed at several other places in Branson in past years and have found nothing comparable to Golden Arrow. We are so glad we found this great little place to add to the enjoyment of our vacations!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderfulness at the Golden Arrow Resort”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: I stayed at he famous Golden Arrow Resort for the first time. It is classic. Undoubtably the greatest place to stay for the weekend traveler in Branson Missouri. It is super close to Silver Dollar City, and only 300 yards away from Table Rock Lake. A+++ AMAZING!

HotelInfo.Name: Golden Arrow Resort
HotelInfo.Address: 2869 Indian Point Rd, Branson, MO 65616
